title: Making a ranked team
body:
HI! I'am creating a new ranked team to queue up and clime the ladder! we have a skype and discord(teamspeak coming up soon) server to talk.
thing to know:
1: you will be given a role after talking with me 
2: roles can be changed 

3: If your not active for more then 1 month, out you go
4: dont be salty in chat
5: any complaints can be sent to admins email(will be in server)
https://discord.gg/ZZm9Wqz

application:
1: acuall age: (please)
2:current rank: (not very important)
3: are you free?
4: have you been perma banned before:(VERY IMPORTANT)
